Package com.capstone.rest

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.capstone.rest.CustomerController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RestController @RequestMapping("/customer") public class CustomerController extends Object
The CustomerController class handles HTTP requests related to customers. It provides RESTful endpoints for adding, retrieving, listing, and authenticating customers. This controller class is responsible for interacting with the CustomerService.
Since:
2023-10-11
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • add

      @PostMapping(value="/add", consumes="application/json") public Customer add(@RequestBody Customer c)
      Adds a new customer to the system.
      Parameters:
      c - The Customer object to be added.
      Returns:
      The added Customer object.

    • find

      @GetMapping(value="/{id}", produces="application/json") public Customer find(@PathVariable String custid)
      Retrieves a customer by their unique identifier (custid).
      Parameters:
      custid - The unique identifier of the customer.
      Returns:
      The Customer object with the specified custid.

    • list

      @GetMapping(value="/all", produces="application/json") public List<Customer> list()
      Retrieves a list of all customers in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of Customer objects.

    • authenticate

      @GetMapping(value="/login", produces="application/json") public Customer authenticate(@RequestParam String custid, @RequestParam String password)
      Authenticates a customer based on their custid and password.
      Parameters:
      custid - The custid of the customer.
      password - The password of the customer.
      Returns:
      The authenticated Customer object.
